title: Tenways CGO Compact: E-Bike Shrinks for Urban Living
summary: Tenways' new CGO Compact e-bike launched in Europe, designed for ultimate portability in tight urban spaces. Its unique handlebar twist, folding pedals, and small wheels allow it to lay flat, while a MIK HD carrier hauls up to 27kg.

title: Surprise! God of War 2D Prequel Drops Instantly on PS5
summary: Sony's State of Play revealed God of War: Sons of Sparta, a 2D side-scrolling prequel available now on PS5. Explore young Kratos' canon story, mastering spear combat and divine artifacts.

title: Helion's Polaris Hits 150M°C: Fusion Power for Microsoft!
summary: Fusion startup Helion's Polaris device just hit 150 million degrees Celsius. This critical milestone propels them closer to delivering commercial fusion power to Microsoft by their 2028 deadline.

title: Waymo's Open Door Problem: DoorDash Drivers Step In
summary: Waymo's autonomous vehicles face a surprising roadblock: an open door can immobilize them. To circumvent this, Waymo is reportedly enlisting DoorDash drivers to ensure car doors are properly shut.

title: Best Apple 3-in-1 Wireless Chargers (2026): Travel Smart
summary: Discover the ultimate compact, folding 3-in-1 wireless travel chargers for your Apple ecosystem. Keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods powered up wherever your adventures take you.

title: How Ilia Malinin Revolutionized Figure Skating with His Quadruple Axel
